name: Drakenlords – Magic Duels Trading Card Game TCG
name_original: Drakenlords – Magic Duels Trading Card Game TCG
description:
Drakenlords is a sword and sorcery TCG card game packed with PvP and PvE game modes, single player adventures and, sometimes, a dragon!

Battle for power and cards as an epic hero in a fantasy world of dragon battles, alchemy and magic card duels. This fast card game brings back the magic and strategy of classic TCG card games. Unleash powerful cards of dragon magic and battle alchemy!

FEATURES
+ Battle players from around the world in this real time PvP fantasy card duels free TCG game.
+ Epic boss fights in single player, sword and sorcery adventure card battles. Defeat a Battle Alchemist, a Zombie Dragon, a Magic Phoenix and more.
+ 400 unique TCG cards with classic fantasy card game illustrations of Dragon legends and magic spells.
+ Unlock powerful cards and skills for your playable hero: master Battle Alchemy, Dragon Magic and more.
+ Balanced TCG magic card duels in PvP game modes: Sealed Deck Arena and Ranked.
+ Perfected for mobile: free, small size, fast TCG card battle games.

Drakenlords features KTplay, under Kriptanium’s ToS: http://download.ktplay.com/DocImage/termsforclientuser/ktplay_users_terms_us.html
